title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When both projects P1 and P2 are selected, observe that the 'Open Project' menu item is available, but the 'Close Project' option is not.
EB: Both 'Open Project' and 'Close Project' menu items should be consistently available when multiple projects are selected.
SR:
1. Create two projects, P1 and P2.
2. Select P2.
3. Attempt to close P2 and observe the availability of 'Close Project' in the menu.
